TITLE: Tupelo, Mississippi pilot threatening to crash plane into Walmart, police say
SUMMARY: A pilot has threatened to crash into a Walmart in Tuleop, Mississippi authorities warned Saturday as they evacuated the area.

TITLE: Delicious beef-and-veggie kabob for a sizzling end-of-summer meal: Try the recipe
SUMMARY: It's Labor Day weekend — and millions of Americans will be spending time with family and friends during the holiday. This recipe for a delicious beef-and-veggie kabob is easy to make.

TITLE: Jim Wahlberg offers message of giving back during charity golf event: 'It's a matter of responsibility'
SUMMARY: Executive director of the Mark Wahlberg Youth Foundation, Jim Wahlberg, shares the story behind his family's charity and says it's everyone's 'responsibility' to give back.

TITLE: Vulnerable Democrats avoid Biden's anti-MAGA speech, Trump-backed candidates fire back at divisive remarks
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden gave a speech Thursday, where he called MAGA Republicans "extreme threats to the democracy."

TITLE: Memphis mom, 1-year-old abducted outside Target at midday; police hunt suspects
SUMMARY: Memphis Police are looking for two men allegedly involved in the abduction and robbery of a mother and her 1-year-old this week. It happened in a Target parking lot.

TITLE: Yankees blanked in Tampa Bay, lead in AL East down to 5 games: ‘That’s an embarrassing loss’
SUMMARY: The New York Yankees were shut out for the sixth time since the All-Star break, losing 9-0 to the Tampa Bay Rays Friday night. Their lead in the AL East is down to five games.

TITLE: Gorbachev funeral draws thousands in Russia, but not Putin
SUMMARY: Russian President Vladimir Putin skipped out on Mikhail Gorbachev's funeral after he refused to declare a state funeral. Putin was critical of Gorbachev's relationship with the West.

TITLE: Nine migrants found dead at Texas border, 53 apprehended trying to cross Rio Grande
SUMMARY: The bodies of nine migrants were found Thursday and another 53 were caught trying to enter the United States from through the Rio Grande, authorities said.

TITLE: WaPo editorial board says Biden’s ‘MAGA’ speech 'fell short’: 'demeaning' to 'conservatives of goodwill'
SUMMARY: On Friday, The Washington Post Editorial Board slammed the "partisan" and "scolding" tone of President Biden's speech against "MAGA Republicans."

TITLE: Old Dominion takes down Virginia Tech: ‘I couldn’t be more proud of this team’
SUMMARY: For the second time in four tries, the Old Dominion Monarchs beat Virginia Tech, scoring the winning touchdown with 33 seconds to play in the fourth quarter.
